snippet.title: Swimming Poo - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Swimming Poo
ADD TO WISHLIST
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2100500/Swimming_Poo/

Created by
Mikołaj Grzebieniak & Maciej Warzycha

Based on a party idea of Grzegorz Behan

Lead Programmist
Sargis Abrahamyan

https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100070687136594
https://www.instagram.com/swimming_poo_official/

Characters Animations in Trailer
Dwi Rongo

Additional characters and environment animations
Maciej Warzycha

Written, Directed and Edited by
Mikołaj Grzebieniak

Voice Actors
Brian Hull as Simon
Jon Bailey as Poopie

Actors for reference
Filip Orliński as Simon
Maciej Frąszczak as Scared Man and Poopie

Character Modeling
Guilerme Gilcian
Latu Arifian

Additional 3D models
Sony Taufan

Environment design creation & rendering
Maciej Warzycha

Special Effects
Akhil VS

Music
Dj Creon
Michał Janek-Jankowski

Additional sounds recording
Bartosz Miszczyk m23studio

Mix & Mastering
Artur Urbański SoundMedia
